title: Infinity.Runner.Deluxe.Edition-PLAZA
description:
-P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S-
Infinity Runner - Deluxe Edition (c) Wales Interactive

Date ....................................................... July.2014
Size ............................................................ 1xCD
Languages .................................................... English
Protection ..................................................... Steam

The Infinity is the largest spaceship ever built by man-kind; flung
into the void of space to secure humanity a new home amongst the stars.
However, instead of discovering paradise, the inhabitants of The
Infinity unlocked the door to a long forgotten nightmare.
Deep inside this leviathan something terrible hunts, out of myth and
legend the last werewolf stalks the ship. Infinity Runner centres on a
prisoner desperately trying to escape the decaying ship and the
clutches of the terror within.

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the folder /PLAZA
5. Play

Notes: Official Deluxe Edition includes soundtrack and art book.

CODEX - ENiGMA - ADDONiA - ACTiVATED
